resources.string: Dive into the exciting world of coding and unlock your potential at our Husky Coding Club!
Explore the fascinating realm of engineering and innovate with us at our club!
Embark on an epic journey of creativity and coding at our Game Development Club!
Husky Helper is a mobile app developed in Android Studio for TCSS 450 in Spring quarter 2024.
This app is intended to provide a collection of resources for UW Tacoma first-year students, with information on academic resources, RSOs and Clubs, studying spaces, and parking locations on campus.
This app was made by Cecil Susi, Tammy Nguyen, and An Ha.
